While you're at it, don't forget you can win some exclusive Coca-Cola premiums when you share with us your most creative photos of the new mini-cans and the 'Mini Kiosk'! Entries are valid only when it includes the hashtag #GetCreativewithCokeMini in your post and your social media profiles are public. 

See you this weekend!

2.post_text:
Coca-Cola mini-cans have landed in Singapore!

The 150ml Coca-Cola mini-can is another step to help Singaporeans enjoy the great taste they know and love while managing their sugar intake! With 63 kcal, as compared to 134 kcal for a 320ml can of Coca-Cola Classic, the Coca-Cola mini-can provides just the right amount of your favourite drink when you want a little less. 

This weekend (27 - 29 Oct), we’ll be bringing our very own Coca-Cola 'Mini Kiosk' to: 
1. NTUC Xtra Jurong Point
2. NTUC Xtra Ang Mo Kio Hub
3. NTUC Xtra Kallang Wave Mall

Stand to win exclusive Coca-Cola premiums when you share with us your most creative and eye-catching photos featuring the new mini-cans and the Mini Kiosk! Don’t forget to include the hashtag #GetCreativewithCokeMini in your post and ensure your social media profiles are public, to be eligible for the contest! T&Cs apply.

3.post_text:
Do you check the labels on your favourite beverages while grocery shopping? 

Here's an easy guide before you hit the checkout counter: 
When choosing between beverages, look for those with the Healthier Choice Symbol (HCS), like a Coca-Cola Zero Sugar! Drinks with this symbol contain at least 25% less sugar compared to regular sweetened beverages or products from the same food category.

Make sure you participate in the Eat.Drink.Shop Healthy Challenge and be rewarded with attractive prizes! Visit gethealthy.sg/eatdrinkshop for more details.

5.post_text:
Overindulged during the weekend and feeling a little guilty? How about starting your week right by grabbing some fresh greens and going easy on the sugar?

For doing something so simple, be rewarded with exciting prizes when you choose healthier meal and beverage options that bear the Healthier Choice Symbol (HCS) like a Coca-Cola Zero Sugar! 

Everything sure tastes better when you win. Find out how by visiting gethealthy.sg/eatdrinkshop today!

6.post_text:
Do you know that taking the first step to a healthy diet is as easy as 1-2-3? 

1. Eat: Opt for grilled food instead of deep-fried food as grilling uses less oil which means lesser calories
2. Drink: Choose beverages with the Healthier Choice symbol that has lower/no sugar, like a Coca-Cola Zero Sugar to go with your meal
3. Shop: Make smart choices everyday for you and your family by choosing healthier food and drink options whether dining in or out

Participate in the Eat.Drink.ShopHealthy challenge and be rewarded with attractive prizes! For more details, visit gethealthy.sg/eatdrinkshop.

8.post_text:
Trick, or treat? Well, it's definitely a treat for all you Coca-Cola fans! 

Coca-Cola is proud to be the Official Beverage Partner for the 7th installment of Halloween Horror Nights™ 7 #HHN7 at the Universal Studios Singapore. From now till 29 October, enjoy an exclusive online promotion which includes one general admission pass and one FREE 22oz Coca-Cola® redemption voucher, for just $58 (min. 3 to go, U.P $68)! 

Hurry, start booking your tickets now at http://www.halloweenhorrornights.com.sg/tickets today!

9.post_text:
[WINNER ANNOUNCEMENT] 

Thank you everyone for your responses to our Coca-Cola Freestyle 7000 contest! Are you ready to know the answer? 

The Coca-Cola Freestyle 7000 offers over 55+ beverage choices, including 30+ no- or low-sugar options that have been awarded the Healthier Choice Symbol. 

A big congratulations to the following winners who made the right guess/had the closest guess, and had use the right hashtag! We’ll be getting in touch with these 3 winners shortly. 

1. Benjamin Chew - 55+
2. Chi Wai Lee - 60
3. Julia Lim - 60+ (first person to provide this answer)

Just because you’re struggling with a busy schedule today doesn’t mean you can disregard your diet or well-being. Go out and have some fresh air! 

And while you’re at it, opt for a veggie-loaded sandwich to get the vitamins and nutrients you need! Perk up your afternoon with an ice-cold Coca-Cola Zero Sugar for some instant refreshment too.

See how you can turn your everyday meal habits by choosing healthier options, into exciting rewards today with the Health Promotion Board’s Eat, Drink, Shop Healthy Challenge. Find out more here by visiting gethealthy.sg/eatdrinkshop.

“Go where to eat for lunch today ah?” 

Why think so hard when you can treat yourself to a wide variety of local meal bundles with Coca-Cola on Deliveroo? Get your meal bundles for 2, 4 or 6 today!

#SGFoodwithCoke #deliverLAH #CokexDeliveroo #localfavourites

Promotion ends on 3 September 2017. T&Cs apply. Meal bundles are subject to availability. Visit www.deliveroo.com.sg for more details.

16.post_text:
Fans of local food, REJOICE! For this National month only, we celebrate our undying love for local food with special meal bundles from Deliveroo and Coca-Cola! So round up your buddies and get 1-for-1 Coca-Cola whenever you order a “Deliver-Lah” meal bundle for 2, 4, or 6. What better way to quell those cravings and satisfy your taste buds!  

#BakKutTehwithCoke #deliverLAH #CokexDeliveroo #localfavourites 

Promotion ends on 3 September 2017. T&Cs apply. Meal bundles are subject to availability. Visit www.deliveroo.com.sg for more details.

17.post_text:
Made plans to visit Resorts World at Sentosa  this coming weekend? Don't forget to drop by the 'RWS Street Eats' food festival (12 - 20 August) featuring a wide selection of Southeast Asian street delicacies. Free entry with an exciting array of sweet and savoury treats to choose from, live music performances and pop-up booths... there's so much to look forward to!
 
But listen up, here's your LAST CHANCE TODAY to purchase the early bird special bundle at only just S$30 which gets you 8 event food vouchers, a complimentary can of Coca-Cola®, plus more than S$40 worth of gift vouchers from other brands! Pay lesser to enjoy double the happiness with your family and friends on this foodie adventure!
 
More details available at www.rwsentosa.com/streeteats.

18.post_text:
You don't have to travel the whole of Southeast Asia just to find out how each country's street delicacies taste like, when you can simply get them ALL IN ONE PLACE right here in Singapore! 
 
Resorts World at Sentosa 's 'RWS Street Eats' offers you this wholesome experience from 12 to 20 August, as you get to try out the vast offerings of street delicacies made by chefs from renowned hawkers and eateries from Singapore, Malaysia, Indonesia, Thailand and Vietnam.

Ready to find out more about this 'itinerary' and how you can save $$ yet get the best deals when you purchase an early bird special for JUST S$30? Read up more about it here: www.rwsentosa.com/streeteats.

19.post_text:
What could be a better way to celebrate National Day with, than with a savoury meal of local favourites as you catch the parade on TV in the comfort of your own home? A special local meal BUNDLE from Deliveroo  and Coke! 

Grab your flags, put on your reds and whites, and get your local favourite meal bundles with a 1-for-1 Coca-Cola whenever you order a Deliver-Lah meal bundle for 2, 4 or 6 during this special month! 

Promotion ends on 31 August 2017. T&Cs apply. Meal bundles are subject to availability.

#ChickenRicewithCoke #deliverLAH #HappyBirthdaySingapore #CokexDeliveroo

20.post_text:
Want to try Southeast Asian street delicacies all under one roof? Be sure to visit Resorts World at Sentosa's inaugural 'RWS Street Eats' from 12 to 20 August! More than just a food festival featuring renowned hawkers and eateries from Singapore, Malaysia, Indonesia, Thailand and Vietnam, there's also live music performances and unique pop-up booths to look forward to. 

Entry to ‘RWS Street Eats’ is FREE and dishes are priced from S$4 onwards. But did you know that you can enjoy cost savings when you purchase an early bird bundle? From now till 11 August 2017, purchase an early bird special bundle at only just S$30 which gets you 8 event food vouchers, a complimentary can of Coca-Cola®, plus more than S$40 worth of gift vouchers from other brands!
 
Make a date with your family and friends, and don't forget to check out details at www.rwsentosa.com/streeteats.

22.post_text:
It’s gonna be a PARTY in your mouth when you get to mix two local dishes – Nasi Lemak and Satay! Imagine that, and a Coca-Cola at only $0.52! YES YOU HEARD US RIGHT!

In conjunction with National Day this August, on August 3rd, Deliveroo  will be delivering to hungry Singaporeans CRAVE Nasi Lemak & Teh Tarik's Nasi Lemak Satay Chicken with a can of Coke for just $0.52! With no delivery cost! 

This incredible lobang is definitely one not to be missed! Imagine the fragrant basmati rice, the awesome sambal chili, and the special satay chicken coming together with the refreshing taste of Coca-Cola that goes OHHH… so well together! So mark your calendars, and don’t say we bojio!
 
Visit CokeURL.com/NasilemakandCoke  for more details of the promotion.
#incrediblelobang #dontsaywebojio #NasiLemakWithCoke #CokexDeliveroo #deliverLAH

#BeefHorFunWithCoke #ShiokwithCoke
